generalData.title: General data
generalData.description: They are the data that will identify your batch and will let others know when it starts and if it will be with friends or strangers.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Customize your batch and think about the characteristics that your group of friends has and the amount they want to save per period.

resume.title: Resumen
resume.description: Finally, confirm that all the information is correct and choose in which round you will receive your batch.

invitation.title: Invitation
invitation.description: Share it with the people you want to start this savings circle with by sending them an email.

wallet.title: Digital wallet
wallet.description: Please enter your wallet from the navigation bar
